snippet: Kendall Francois, 43, was sentenced in 2000 to life without parole in the deaths of the women, whom he strangled and whose remains he kept in his house.
abstract: Kendall Francois, who admitted strangling eight prostitutes in 1990s and stashing their remains in his home, dies at age 43 in prison in western New York, where he was serving sentence of life without parole.
lead_paragraph: Kendall Francois, 43, was sentenced in 2000 to life without parole in the deaths of the women, whom he strangled and whose remains he kept in his house.

headline.main: Man Who Dismembered Eight Women in the ’90s Dies in Prison
headline.print_headline: Man Who Dismembered Eight Women in the ’90s Dies in Prison
